column3: Mr. President, listen to the scientists. Climate change is not a "hoax." It is real and it is caused by human activity. We must transform our energy system away from fossil fuels and create millions of good-paying jobs rebuilding our disappearing middle class.
column4: Mr. President, I want to congratulate you and your family for making it easier for people to participate in the political process in a way that is fair to all of you. I look forward to working with you on this very important issue.
column5: Mr. President, we have got to stand up to the greed of the pharmaceutical industry.
